thread.title: Kristen Bell Shows Her Makeup-Free Face Before the Golden Globe Awards
thread.title_full: Kristen Bell Shows Her Makeup-Free Face Before the Golden Globe Awards

author: Sarah Siegel
title: Kristen Bell Shows Her Makeup-Free Face Before the Golden Globe Awards
text:
Kristen Bell Getting Ready For Golden Globes 2017 Kristen Bell Shows Her Makeup-Free Face Before the Golden Globe Awards January 8, 2017 Share This Link Copy What’s Your Reaction? Thanks for your reaction Don’t forget to share this with your friends! ← Use Arrows Keys → 1 Kristen Bell Shows Her Makeup-Free Face Before the Golden Globe Awards 
During award season, it can seem like celebrities show up ready for the red carpet effortlessly. Kristen Bell isn't afraid to reveal how much goes into her glamorous looks and shared her humorous routine on Instagram . The hysterical actress posted a photo of herself before her team of beauty experts worked their magic. 
In this endearing photo, Kristen stands in a doorway, open suitcase in front of her, sans makeup, and with her hair falling in various directions. She joked that she "woke up like this" in the caption with a smirk on her face. 
In another photo, Kristen shared an image of three separate experts working on her at once, proof that celebrities have an entire team devoted to making them look stunning. 
Obviously Kristen's glam team did a great job; her loose waves paired gorgeously with her smoky eye makeup and peach lip. We can't get enough of Kristen's beauty as well as her candid honesty and humor. Related:
